content:
Here is a sample site map for Prairie Cotton's website:

* Home
	+ About Prairie Cotton
	+ Our Story
	+ Our Ethos
	+ Our Team
	+ Contact Us
* Collections
	+ Women's Clothing
		- Dresses
		- Tops
		- Bottoms
		- Outerwear
	+ Men's Clothing
		- Tops
		- Bottoms
		- Outerwear
	+ Accessories
		- Hats
		- Bags
		- Scarves
* Lookbook
	+ Women's Outfits
	+ Men's Outfits
* Blog
	+ Fashion Tips
	+ Sustainability
	+ Behind the Scenes
* Customer Service
	+ FAQs
	+ Return Policy
	+ Shipping Information
	+ Contact Us

This site map outlines the main categories and sub-categories of content that could be included on Prairie Cotton's website. Of course, this is just a starting point and you may want to customize the site map to better fit the specific needs and goals of your brand. It's also a good idea to consider the overall structure and hierarchy of the site map to ensure that it is intuitive and easy for users to navigate.
